About Me
+
+
My name is Gabriel Escobar. I'm a second year student at the University of Toronto + studying Industrial Engineering.
I am passionate about Artificial Intelligence and + Machine Learning, and I love computer science. I was born in El Salvador, spent my high school years + in Costa Rica,
and I now live in Toronto, Ontario.

+
+
+
+ My goal is to lead the implementation of technology in developing communities. I also hope + to create a platform that broadens access to education to those who wish to learn but are not + given adequate means to do so. +
+

Projects
+
We all know and love the Snake game. In this project, I + used PyGame to create a Snake game from scratch, as seen below. + To take this project a step further, I created an AI that plays + the game, improving with each trial (using reinforcement learning). + Here's a look at what the AI looks like over 100 trials into its learning.
